title: Overheard
author: VD
content_html:
Speaking of games, after a careless hunter let his idiot wolf aggro not one, but two massive swarms of ogres, a warrior surveyed the piles of bodies strewn about the battlefield and commented:

“It’s like the Ogrecaust!”
content_text:
Speaking of games, after a careless hunter let his idiot wolf aggro not one, but two massive swarms of ogres, a warrior surveyed the piles of bodies strewn about the battlefield and commented:
“It’s like the Ogrecaust!”
